channel.title: Java "or" help
channel.description: ok so im trying to make the command ::command, which shows you a list of commands. i also want ::help to do that, so how would i do this? i tried this already "if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Commands")) || if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("Help"))" i thought that || means or? how would i fix this? also how do i make a clear inventory command?

item.title: Java "or" help
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

ok, ill try it

Read full topic

item.title: Java "or" help
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("commands") || command.equalsIgnoreCase("help")) {
code here
}

also…

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("empty")) {
		for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
			playerItems[i] = 0;
		}
		for (int i = 0; i < playerItemsN.length; i++) {
			playerItemsN[i] = 0;
		}
deleteItem(i, 999999999);
}

something like that…

item.title: Java "or" help
item.dc:creator: @thunderflea thunderflea
item.description:
@thunderflea wrote:

ok so im trying to make the command ::command, which shows you a list of commands.
i also want ::help to do that, so how would i do this?
i tried this already “if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Commands”)) || if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“Help”))”
i thought that || means or? how would i fix this?
also how do i make a clear inventory command?

Read full topic
